snippet.title: The Associated Press Guide To Punctuation
snippet.description: Punctuation in skilled hands is a remarkably subtle system of signals, signs, symbols and winks that keep readers on the smoothestroad. Too subtle, perhaps: Has any critic or reviewer ever praised an author for being a master of punctuation,Â ...
